collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information that
AlphaKEK.AI ("we", "us", or "our") may collect from users of our AI platform
and services ("you" or "your"), and how we use, maintain, protect, and
disclose that information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Acceptance of This Policy By accessing and
using our services, you agree to the collection and use of your anonymized
data in accordance with this policy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information We Collect We do not collect
any personal data from our users.

collection.label: VAGUE
collection.sentence:
However, to ensure the functionality and
continuous improvement of our services, we do temporarily store the text of
users' queries.

collection.label: CLEAR
collection.sentence:
Anonymized Query Logs: When you interact with our services, we
retain the text of your queries in an anonymized format for up to 7 days in
our logs for the purpose of tracking errors and enhancing service performance.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Cookies and Tracking Data: We may use cookies and similar tracking
technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Use of Data We use the information that we collect: \-
To provide and maintain our services; \- To track the usage of our services;
\- To detect, prevent, and address technical issues; \- To analyze information
so as to improve and enhance our services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Data Retention The anonymized
query data we collect is retained for no longer than 7 days.
